item.title: Script Security
item.description:
ZAP has as very powerful scripting capability, and supports the following scripting languages:

  • JavaScript - included by default
  • Zest - included by default
  • BeanShell - optional
  • Groovy - optional
  • Kotlin - optional
  • Python - optional
  • Ruby - optional
